comment: I took this course online and it was pretty easy. Weekly assignments that usually included a discussion or quiz. You have to attend two dance concerts and construct an essay on them. The final was the same as the study guide. Easy A if you do your work.

Good professor but just gives an insane amount of work. As a STEM major, I think I had more readings in this class to complete than any of my other classes. He responds to emails really quick and has clear grading rubrics but has a lot of work. He grades generously but this isn't a class you can take and slack off.
